DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator to ask if a treatment regimen that was given prior to the current protocol was completed as planned.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the prior therapy regimen being complete.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Complete; having every necessary or normal part or component or step; or having come or been brought to a conclusion.:A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.

Concepts.definition: To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient complete prior therapy regimen?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Were all cycles of the regimen completed

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient complete therapy for the malignancies >= 1 year ago?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has completed remission induction therapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was drug administered within 3 months of enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received anti-neuroblastoma cytotoxic chemotherapy within the last two years?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was drug administered within 3 months or enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient completed therapy for the malignancy >= 12 months prior to randomization and is considered disease-free?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient completed therapy for the malignancy at least 12 months prior to randomization and is the patient considered disease-free?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient meet the indicated prior therapy requirements?
